title: Parade now has 50+ Orgs and 350+ Active Users!
description: In just the last couple weeks Parade has grown tremendously! Thanks to everyone for your support, and for your feedback!!

title: We're now on Google Play!
description: Check out our beta on the Android Play store - available today!

title: Parade Beta Launches on App Store
description: We are officially on the app store!

title: Be on our Org Spotlight!
description: Every week we showcase multiple student orgs on our instagram page! If you'd like to have your org showcased, let us know!
